title: I’m Proud of You
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>What’s the matter, Ruby? You seem restless.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Umm, Ruby got back some quiz results....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>So you came to show me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yeah. Here....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>....My. Oh my! Ruby! These are fantastic!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ehehe! Ruby got good scores this time. Are you happy, Onee-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Of course I am.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby is glad! It’s because my scores are so high, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>That’s not what it’s about. Well, I am happy that you got good scores, but I’m happier to see that your efforts have paid off, Ruby. You did a great job. I’m really proud of you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Onee-chan....!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
